name: Dark Mood
description: Somber and shadowy atmosphere with low-key lighting and ominous undertones

prompt.base: Dark moody atmosphere, low-key lighting, deep shadows, somber tone, ominous undertones, shadowy environment, brooding mood, mysterious darkness, heavy atmosphere
prompt.positive: dark atmosphere, deep shadows, low-key lighting, somber mood, ominous tone, shadowy environment, moody lighting, mysterious darkness, brooding atmosphere, heavy shadows, dark palette, noir lighting
prompt.negative: bright lighting, cheerful atmosphere, vibrant colors, sunny mood, light and airy, optimistic tone, high-key lighting, pastel colors

technical.color_palette: Desaturated with dark tones, deep blacks

variations.name: Gothic Dark
variations.modifier: gothic architecture, candlelight, medieval darkness, haunting atmosphere, ancient shadows

variations.name: Urban Dark
variations.modifier: city night, neon reflections, rain-slicked streets, urban shadows, modern noir

variations.name: Natural Dark
variations.modifier: forest at night, moonless sky, natural shadows, wilderness darkness, primal atmosphere

examples: A dimly lit corridor with deep shadows, low-key lighting creating ominous atmosphere, dark moody tone
A character silhouetted against minimal light, heavy shadows, brooding dark atmosphere
